product_name: Maranda Enterprises Llc Metal Ladderball Game
long_description: The Metal Ladderball game is quickly becoming a favorite pastime for beach parties, back yard barbecues and picnics. Easy to learn, you'll enjoy hours of outdoor fun with family and friends.
